title: Change info
body:
I forgot my password of my email. Now, how I could change it in this situation? 
Thank you very much!

replies.body:
Hey there,

You'd have to [submit a ticket to Player Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) regarding this, they'll ask you some questions to verify you are the original owner of the account and then will be happy to change your email for you.
